meanings.sent1: She was the cagiest person in the group, always watching before speaking.
meanings.sent2: The detective was the cagiest of them all, never revealing his true intentions.
meanings.sent3: The cagiest squirrel in the park always managed to hide its nuts in the most unexpected places.
meanings.sent4: Her cagiest smile hid a world of thoughts no one could decipher.
meanings.sent5: The cagiest cat in the neighborhood moved like a shadow, unseen and unheard.

meanings.sent1: He was the cagiest player on the team, always finding a way to outsmart his opponents.
meanings.sent2: The politician was known for being the cagiest speaker, never giving a straight answer.
meanings.sent3: The cagiest fox in the forest managed to steal food without anyone noticing.
meanings.sent4: Her cagiest move in the game surprised everyone and led her to victory.
meanings.sent5: The cagiest salesman could sell ice to an Eskimo with his smooth talk.
